alert.note: Alert for Duval; Jim Wells; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued February 16 at 2:39AM CST until February 18 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...INCREASING THREAT FOR CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER ON THURSDAY... .Very warm, breezy and significantly drier air will arrive behind a dryline on Thursday. Combined with very dry fuels, critical fire weather conditions are possible before a cold front arrives Thursday evening with improving conditions. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR VERY BREEZY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE RIO GRANDE PLAINS AND THE BRUSH COUNTRY... The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Thursday morning through Thursday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...La Salle...McMullen...Live Oak...Webb... Duval...Jim Wells. * TIMING...9 AM Thursday until 12 AM Friday. * WIND...Northwest around 20 MPH with occasional gusts to 30 MPH. Winds will shift to the north and northeast after sunset at 15 to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...Falling to around 10 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Duval; Jim Wells; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb
